name: Claims Warranty Processing
content:
Warranty Claims AI Assistant


Project Overview


Objective:

Develop an AI system that-

  • Processes diesel engine warranty claims across multiple document types
  • Determines warranty status and appropriate response paths
  • Generates consistent, professional customer communications


Key Features:

  • Document Processing : Extracts customer data, warranty status, and claim details from PDFs
  • Warranty Validation : Cross-references claims against master warranty database
  • Communication Analysis : Integrates prior customer interactions for context


Components:

Document Intake System

  • Accepts: Claim forms, Master data PDFs, Communication records
  • Validates document completeness and structure
  • Organizes multi-customer processing queue


AI Analysis Engine

  • LLM: Custom-trained model with diesel engine domain knowledge
  • Processing: Multi-document cross-referencing with entity extraction
  • Validation: Warranty status determination with timestamp verification


Output:

Customer Response Package

  • Structured warranty information in consistent tabular format
  • Professional response with appropriate next steps
  • Clear service options based on warranty status
description: Automated analysis of diesel engine warranty claims for optimal customer service
